data.title: How to watch NRK online outside Norway with a VPN
data.meta_description: Can't watch NRK abroad? That's because this service is geo-restricted. Find out how to watch NRK outside Norway with the best VPNs for NRK.
data.text:
Try to watch NRK online, outside Norway, and chances are you’ll come across the message, “Ikke tilgjengelig utenfor Norge”. Which roughly translates as “Not available outside of Norway”. Region-locked websites and services are increasingly common, and are seen with streaming services such as Netflix, BBC iPlayer, and DAZN. However, you can bypass such restrictions and watch NRK and other streaming platforms outside Norway by using a VPN.

Short for Virtual Private Networks, VPNs route your device’s internet traffic through an encrypted tunnel to one of their servers elsewhere in the world. If you connect to a VPN server in Norway, you’ll obtain a Norwegian IP address and then be able to access region-locked Norweigan services, such as NRK, from anywhere in the world.

How to watch NRK online outside Norway with a VPN

It may surprise you to learn that setting up and using a VPN is very quick and easy. Follow the steps below, and you’ll be watching your favorite content in no time.

Here’s how to use a VPN to watch NRK online outside Norway:

NRK is free and doesn’t require you to sign up for an account in order to watch its content. However, creating an account allows you access to some minor features.

Sign up with one of the best VPNs for NRK — we particularly recommend NordVPN.

Download and install the appropriate VPN app or browser extension for your device.

Open the VPN app or browser extension and click to connect to a server in Norway. This will gain you the Norwegian IP address necessary to access NRK.

Go to NRK and watch the newly unblocked content without restriction!

You may need to clear your browser’s cache and cookies for changes to take effect. However, we found that this wasn’t necessary during our testing of VPNs with NRK.

Methodology: How we chose the best VPNs for NRK

Every VPN is different, and not all of them are able to securely access NRK from outside of Norway. Our team of experts created a strict set of criteria to filter these out until only the best VPNs for NRK remained. Here’s a brief overview of what we looked for:

Norwegian servers: NRK is region-locked, so you’ll need a Norwegian server to use it abroad. We considered how many of these were available, whether they were physical or virtual, and how many other server locations each VPN had to offer.

High speeds: Sluggish speeds cause all kinds of problems, from long buffering times to random disconnection. We personally run nine speed tests per VPN and average the results to see how quick and consistent each provider’s performance is.

Security and privacy: It’s not enough to be able to stream; you also have to be secure while doing so. That’s why we looked for VPNs with a no-logs policy, protection against IPv6 and DNS leaks, a kill switch, and 256-bit encryption. If more advanced security tools are included, that’s even better.

Streaming ability: The main goal might be to watch NRK, but sooner or later, you’ll probably want to watch something else. Our team tests VPNs against a variety of Norwegian streaming services and international platforms like Netflix so we can say with confidence which are the most versatile.

Multi-platform support: Users should be able to stream safely at all times, and that means finding VPNs that work with a wide range of popular devices and operating systems. We’re big fans of anything that reduces the barrier to entry even further, whether it’s 24/7 live chat, a lack of connection limits, or just beginner-friendly designs.

Value for money: We’ll never recommend services that charge more than they’re worth. Additionally, we search high and low for any deals, discounts, free trials, or money-back guarantees, often claiming these for ourselves to make sure they’re really as straightforward as they seem.

Interested in learning more? Our VPN testing methodology post explains our process in greater detail.
